activities:
Velocity collects personal information from current and prospective customers, employees, vendors and other persons located in the European Union. Information may be collected through website visits, emails, telephone calls, chats, web forms or other means. Velocity uses this information to contact those persons regarding services, employment opportunities, and potential business transactions. 

Velocity collects personal information from its customers, vendors and employees located in the European Union through website visits, emails, telephone calls, chat, web forms, and other means. Velocity uses such information to establish and provide services to those customers, including as part of the sales/contracting process, for service delivery, order handling, payment processing, promotions, providing customer support, compliance with regulations, fraud detection and managing relations with vendors. 

When providing information technology hosting services, Velocity may process personal data controlled by its customers located in the European Union. Velocity does not determine the types of data its customers store on Velocity servers or how that data is classified, accessed, exchanged or otherwise processed. Velocity's customers are responsible for compliance with applicable data protection principles. Velocity processes data at the direction of its customers and in accordance with the terms of its agreements with its customers.
personaldata: On-line, off-line, customer-stored data, manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU and/or Swiss Data Protection Authorities
